ygData.subject: Re: 14 lvl spells
ygData.msgSnippet: RE: Halo of Light.......I never really thought much about getting the spell myself, i had a Greater Lifghtstone, then i gpot the Screaming Mace and i also Have
ygData.messageBody:
RE: Halo of Light.......I never really thought much about getting the spell
myself, i had a Greater Lifghtstone, then i gpot the Screaming Mace and i
also Have a SHiny Brass sheild they are great lightsources..... and
following nature's course of the game, We all die once in awhile, sad but
true.......SO you are hunting in Steamfront but you are bound in Kaladim,
you die, and you happen to be a human, Have you ever tried walking through
lesser faydark with no light source? it is not a pleasant
experience.......So in turn i bought the Halo of Light Spell for that reason
only...when i die, i'd like to see where i'm going to get back to my body

Lady Bree Nightingale <Mercenaries Of Doom>
Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki <olli.haapamaki@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 8:47 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] 14 lvl spells


>From: Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki <olli.haapamaki@...>
>
>> Date: Tue, 01 Jun 1999 22:39:44 -0500
>> From: david willis <davidpw@...>
>>Subject: 14 lvl spells
>>
>>Hello all,
>>I just made 14 recently and wonder if you can help me out with spells.
>>
>>Any recommendations for 14 lvl spells beside heal and bind?
>>
>>I've been thinking about Halo of Light because I hate the dark but
>>I dont want to spend 7pp on something that a lantern does. Does it really
>>help to see around you when your in the dark or is just in the immediate
radius?
>
>There is absolutely no use for such a spell as Halo of light IMHO. When you
complete the Screaming Mace quest (Crushbone zone) you will probably have
two items which both work as a halo of light. Both Screaming Mace and Shiny
Brass Shield provide light to times when i travel in the dark. Don't spend
any money on such a useless spell as Halo of light. But if you are not
anywhere near Faydwer then if you absolutely must have some light for the
dark times go for it.
>
>For other lvl 14 spells i have Healing, Expulse Undead/Smite all the time
memmed and Bind Affinity, Cancel Magic and Invis vs Undead are often memmed.
>
>Iyenya - Lvl 17 Dwarf - Sons of Serilis
>Innoruuk server
>
